welcome_message_title: Welcome to San Salvador de Jujuy
welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Salvador de Jujuy, a charming city known for its vibrant culture and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore our colorful markets, historic architecture, and breathtaking landscapes, and to enjoy all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.address: Belgrano 630 (Lavalle), 4600 San Salvador de Jujuy, Jujuy

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Cadillal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at El Cadillal Airport handles all cargo operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
